paragraph.heading: 1Interface Construction Page
paragraph.paragraph: This page is where you will construct the Vision2 interface that you wish to be generated by the wizard.

As you can see from the screenshot, this page is far more involved than any of the other pages in this wizard and is a powerful tool built using EiffelBuild technology. The recommended place to begin reading about this tool, is
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xml this document which explains the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xml Notations used in the documentation.
paragraph.heading: 2Window layout
paragraph.paragraph: The window contains several different tools, highlighted below:

list.item:
The
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/30_type_selector/index.xml type selector - Situated at the top left of the window, this tool contains all the available vision2 types available for interface construction.

The
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/63_component_selector/index.xml component_selector - Situated at the bottom left of the window, below the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/30_type_selector/index.xml type selector , this tool contains all the user defined components.

The
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index.xml layout constructor tool - Situated in the middle of the window, this tool displays a graphical representation of the interface that is currently being built.

The docked
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/40_object_editor/index.xml object editor - Situated to the right hand side of the window, this object editor automatically targets itself to the selected
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object in the
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/10_Adding_A_New_Project/interactive_gui_project/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index.xml layout constructor .
